com.cs262.sockets.server

Class ChatServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cs262.sockets.server.ChatServer

  • public class ChatServer
extends java.lang.Object
    Server side of the Socket Chat Application. Initialized by a command-line input of the port number to listen to. The main thread will then listen to connections from chat clients. For each client connection, the server will spawn a new thread of class 'chat' that will read the client inputs and respond accordingly.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  ChatServer.Chat
      When a new client is connected to the chat server, a new chat thread is spawned to service the client.

    • Field Detail

      • accounts

        private static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> accounts
        Hash table to store user accounts. Used for login verification Key = username. Value = password

      • acc_sockets

        private static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.io.PrintWriter> acc_sockets
        Hash table to store client sockets. Used to send messages back to the client Key = username. Value = socket

      • groups

        private static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> groups
        Hash table to store users in chat groups. Key = group name. Value = list of users in the group

      • undeliveredMessages

        private static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> undeliveredMessages
        Hash table to store messages received when a user is offline Key = username. Value = list of messages received when offline

      • accountStatus

        private static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> accountStatus
        Hash table to store the current status of the account. Key = username. Value = one of [OFFLINE, ONLINE]
